creator: fpaone@lehman.com
text:
I am utilizing the jdbc function of jMeter. When I start a
thread, it kicks off ok, but when I stop it, it appears that 
jMeter continues to put a load on the data server, and the 
connections to the data base don't go away until I kill jMeter.

And once jMeter produces a considerable load on the data server, 
the charting seem to degrade.

I believe I've made a kludge that fixes this.  Please verify and give feedback 
to the mailing list.  I think you'll need to get the latest nightly tarball.
